TopicTitle: Is there a way to point a Kerbal's head down before impact ground?

Articles.Content:
In Danny2462's Kirrim on duty I saw his somehow adjust Kirrim's pitch before impact(after using the mass relay to come home)

My testing also shows that impact with head will significantly increase a Kerbal's chance of survival.

I find no keyboard control for EVA pitch. There is a option for joystick, but when I try it the jetpack also give a counter thrust to cancel my joystick pitch input and keep my Kerbal vertical (like ASAS before 0.21)

If I can do this I would need no more parachute for Eve landing as the atmosphere is already thick enough.

Currently I have to use a drop pod:
